SEARCH
Module java.base
Package java.lang

Class TemplatedString.TemplateBuilder

java.lang.Object
java.lang.TemplatedString.TemplateBuilder
Enclosing interface:
TemplatedStringPREVIEW
public static class TemplatedString.TemplateBuilder extends Object
TemplateBuilder is a preview API of the Java platform.
Programs can only use TemplateBuilder when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
Instances of this class can be used to construct a new TemplatedString from string fragments, values and other TemplatedStringsPREVIEW.

To use, construct a new TemplatedString.TemplateBuilderPREVIEW using TemplatedString.builder()PREVIEW, then chain invokes of fragment(java.lang.String) or value(java.lang.Object) to build up the TemplatedStringPREVIEW. template(TemplatedString) can be used to add the fragments and values from another TemplatedStringPREVIEW. build() can be invoked at the end of the chain to produce a new TemplatedStringPREVIEW using the current state of the builder.

Example: 

    int x = 10;
    int y = 20;
    TemplatedString ts = TemplatedString.builder()
        .fragment("The result of adding ")
        .value(x)
        .template(" and \{y} equals \{x + y}")
        .build();
    String result = STR.apply(ts);
Result: "The result of adding 10 and 20 equals 30"
